content: The Duskveil is an optional Yaoguai King boss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 4 of Black Myth Wukong. The cursed and undead remains of a celestial rooster guai, you can find this monster at the peak of the Purple Cloud Mountain, a secret area of the Webbed Hollow.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Duskveil.md', within the main section titled 'The Duskveil'.
The content is as follows:
The Duskveil is an optional Yaoguai King boss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 4 of Black Myth Wukong. The cursed and undead remains of a celestial rooster guai, you can find this monster at the peak of the Purple Cloud Mountain, a secret area of the Webbed Hollow.
